entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023
